resources.string: الجهاز غير متصل بالإنترنت، يُرجى التحقق من الجهاز!
خطأ في الطلب، خطأ غير معروف
تسجيل الدخول غير صالح، يُرجى تسجيل الدخول مجدداً
انتهت مهلة طلب الخادم، يُرجى المحاولة لاحقًا
فشل الطلب، يُرجى التحقق من إعدادات الشبكة
استجابة غير طبيعية من الخادم، يُرجى المحاولة لاحقًا
اتصال الخادم غير طبيعي، يُرجى المحاولة لاحقًا
تم انقطاع الطلب، يُرجى المحاولة مرة أخرى
استقطاب MQTT غير طبيعي، وبدأ التطبيق في الخروج
الشبكة غير طبيعية. يُرجى التحقق من شبكة الجوال
إصدار البوابة الأساسي منخفض جدًا، يجب ترقيته أولاً
الإصدار الحالي للبوابة منخفض جدًا، يُرجى ترقيته أولاً
هو بوابة فرعية وتم ربطها بالفعل
بدون ربط، لا يمكن تعيين البوابة
تم تسجيل دخول حسابك على جهاز آخر. يُرجى تسجيل الدخول مرة أخرى
هل تريد بالتأكيد مسح جميع معلومات السجل من الجهاز؟
زيادة قيمة سطوع درجة الحرارة اللونية
تقليل قيمة سطوع درجة الحرارة اللونية
جهاز تكييف الهواء في الحالة المحددة
هل ترغب حقًا في استبدال هذا الجهاز؟
عند تلف الجهاز أو فقدانه أو انقطاع اتصاله، يمكنك استبداله بجهاز جديد. سيحتفظ الجهاز الجديد بوظائف الجهاز القديم بما في ذلك الاسم، والذكاء الاصطناعي الذكي، والمشاهد وما إلى ذلك
ملاحظة: يجب عدم إضافة الجهاز الجديد إلى أي ذكاء اصطناعي أو مشهد قبل استبدال الجهاز القديم
هل ترغب حقًا في حذف هذا الجهاز؟

We are well aware of the importance of privacy to you. In order to more comprehensively present the relevant situation of our collection and use of your personal information, we have made detailed revisions to the privacy policy in accordance with the requirements of the latest laws and regulations. When you click [Agree], it means that you have fully read, understood and accepted the entire contents of the updated Privacy Policy, and we will continue to improve technology and security management to protect your personal information. Please take some time to familiarize yourself with our Privacy Policy and please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.
The device tag is not obtained
Please agree to the privacy policy first
You need to log in again to switch the server IP, please select the server network
Please enter a valid cell phone number
The two passwords you entered are inconsistent
The password should be at least 6 digits and not more than 16 digits
Please enter the new password again
No cell phone numbers were obtained
Sent successfully, please go to the mailbox to check
The security system is turned off
The name cannot be edited in this mode
Length can\'t be more than 10 digits
All-day security cannot be turned off
Are you sure to delete the binding of this key?
This key is not bound to the scene. Do you want to bind it?
This device is already associated to one scene and cannot be bound to other scenes.
When the curtain is fully open and fully closed once, the motor will remember the running track of the curtain, thus it will generate the curtain travel
1. Pull manually or click the \"Open\" button below, and wait for the curtain to fully open
2. Pull manually or click the \"Close\" button below, and wait for the curtain to fully close
3. After above two steps are confirmed to be correct, the set travel is completed

Adjust the curtain to the required upper and lower limit positions and confirm, then the motor will remember the upper and lower limit positions of the curtain, thus it will generate the curtain travel.

Press and hold the up button until the curtain reaches the upper limit position. After the position is determined, click “Confirm upper”. Similarly, press and hold the down key until the curtain reaches the lower limit position. After the position is determined, click “Confirm lower”. The travel is set.
Note: there is no difference between the upper and lower limit settings. When the upper and lower limit are determined, the curtain travel is set.
Are you sure to clear the route?
If clearing the route, the motor will reset and the remote control needs to be paired again
Please click the button to change the running direction of curtain.
Please click close button after the curtain is completely open
Please wait until curtain is completely closed, that means route setting is done.
Please click to confirm it when the motor is operated to requested upper limit position, then this position will be remembered by the motor.
2.Click “Open” and hold until the curtain is operated to limit position, then click “Pause”
3.After the positions are determined, click “Confirm upper limit position” to complete the setting
Remark: no priority to set upper or lower limit position. After both the upper and lower limit positions are determined, the curtain travel limit setting is completed.
Please click to confirm it when the motor is operated to requested lower limit position, then this position will be remembered by the motor.
2.Click \"Close\" and hold until the curtain is operated to limit position, then click \"Pause\"
3.After the position determined, click \"Confirm lower limit position\" to complete the setting
Delete upper and lower limit positions
Are you sure to delete upper and lower limit positions?
Switch to cleaning along the wall
Are you sure to reset the radar?
The sitting is aware of setting
The sitting is aware of setting
The sitting is aware of limit
Are you sure to relearn environment?
Note: 1.it can\'t exit in process of learning. 2.it should be no person in the environment.
When it\'s learning, please be patient. \nIt will exit when learning is complete.
Note: please do not exit when learning,\n otherwise it will fail.
Interruption of learning due to your withdrawal \nIf you need to learn, please re-enter
No remote has been added yet
1 hour later, the air conditioner will be turned off.
%d hour later, the air conditioner will be turned off.
Please choose what to say to your air conditioner partner：
After aiming the original air conditioner remote control in your hand at the device,\nPress the power button on the remote,\nThe system will automatically find the most matching remote。

Please say \" match TV \" to the air-conditioning controller,align the original remote control in your hand with the device,press remote control keys in turn according to the voice prompt, and the system will automatically learn.
Customized key (long press to edit name)
Are you sure you want to delete this command?
Please set the channel number first.(no more than 3 digits)
Only one scene command can be added
Only one execution scenario can be added
Please choose command to the small speaker:
开启后,语音仅控制本设备绑定的场景、设备和灯控组
该体验可能会受网络影响,请耐心等待
Scan the QR code of the camera
Keep the camera powered on, check if the camera indicator is flashing, if the indicator light is not flashing, please press and hold the Reset button to reset
Make sure the device light is blinking
Please confirm whether the device supports 5G Wi-Fi, if not, please select 2.4G Wi-Fi network
The QR code is facing the camera at 15–25cm, and the device will scan and make a sound.
Hear the prompt tone, and the device is successfully connected to the Internet
In process of connecting, \nplease don\'t disconnect network!
1、keep Router, mobile phone, camera close as possible.
2、Don\'t disconnect the network, it will take 1–2 minutes.

1、After power on the device, please long press Reset button if blue LED is not flashing. Wait for a moment after hear a \'Ding\' sound, and the device will navigate a cruise then reset process is complete.
2、Open Settings > select WLAN, connect the mobile phone wireless network to the device hotspot
4、Keep the mobile phone is connected to device WiFi in process of adding the device
Adjust the detection area to reduce unimportant alarm information
Set an alarm for the device
When motion is detected, the camera will sound an alarm
If detection alerts are too frequent, try lowering the sensitivity
When a human shape is detected, it will automatically turn its head to follow the shot
After closing, there is no sound when viewing real-time and playback recordings
Set the video recording of the card
Block part of the screen with color blocks to protect privacy
After it is turned on, it will frame the human figure moving in the screen
Saved successfully, please view it in the album!
Videos available on the following dates:
